snippet.title: BE MY HORDE | EARLY ACCESS Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
BE MY HORDE IS AVAILABLE NOW IN EARLY ACCESS

GET IT ON STEAM: 
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2499520/Be_My_Horde/

Be My Horde is a top-down 2D survival roguelite. Become a formidable necromancess, and make your enemies a resource! Resurrect each fallen foe, create massive hordes of the undead, and use the harvested souls to enhance your skills, growing more powerful with each death. PRAISE BE MORIANA!

FIND OUT MORE
💀 https://discord.com/invite/wsmQ432DVC 
💀 https://twitter.com/polishedgames
💀 https://www.instagram.com/polishedgames/

#indiegame #trailer #gametrailers
